title: Sadiq Khan – 2021 Comments Following Remembrance Service
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Sadiq Khan, the Mayor of London, on 12 November 2021.
content:
I am truly humbled by the brave sacrifices of our armed forces. Their heroism made the precious freedoms we enjoy every day possible.
